subject: SOAP over JMS
msgSnippet: Can someone pl tell me how I can use JUnit testing framework for SOAP messages using JMS transport? We already have testsuite for Junit with jms, but now we
messageBody:
Can someone pl tell me how I can use JUnit testing framework for
SOAP messages using JMS transport? We already have testsuite for
Junit with jms, but now we want to use SOAP over jms.
Approeciate your help.

Vivek
